title: Area, Volume with exp. and quad. functions part - b

content.description: Let R and S in the figure above be defined as follows: R is the region in the first and second quadrants bounded by the graphs of y = 3 - x2 and y = 2x. S is the shaded region in the first quadrant bounded by the two graphs, the x-axis, and the y-axis.
content.question: Find the volume of the solid generated when R is rotated about the horizontal line y = -1.

frqParts.text: Find the volume of the solid generated when R is rotated about the horizontal line y = -1.

topic.text: 8.12: Volume with Washer Method - Revolving Around Other Axes

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
